entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 30 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
